report.name: prosbum

userParameter.name: P_ConsoAnneeAnt
userParameter.comment: Cette variable contient le consommé des années anttérieures s'il y a au moins une donnée non nulle sur l'année courante, sinon 0. Elle est mise à jour dans le FormatTrigger

dataSource.name: Q_PAGEA
dataSource.select: select 'pagea', decode(substr(:p_param6,5,2), '**', (S.sigdep || '/' || S.sigpole), S.libdsg) dc_libdeppole, cm.clisigle DirMO, substr(to_char(lb.codsg,'FM0000000'),1,5) CODEDP, lb.clicode PCMOUVRA, lb.pid PID, lb.codcamo CODCAMO, rpad(lb.pnom,25) LIBPROJET, floor(nvl(budg.reestime,0)) REESTJH, nvl(budg.bnmont,0) NOTIFJH, floor(nvl(budg.reserve,0)) RESERJH, nvl(budg.anmont,0) ARBITJH, -- consomme des annees precedentes pack_verif_prosbum.ConsommeLigneBIP(lb.pid, -1, NULL) ConsoAnneeAnt, -- consomme mensuel SG pack_verif_prosbum.ConsommeLigneBIP(lb.pid, 1, 1) ConsoMensSG, -- consomme mensuel SSII pack_verif_prosbum.ConsommeLigneBIP(lb.pid, 1, 0) ConsoMensSSII, -- consomme annuel SG pack_verif_prosbum.ConsommeLigneBIP(lb.pid, 0, 1) ConsoAnSG, -- consomme annuel SSII pack_verif_prosbum.ConsommeLigneBIP(lb.pid, 0, 0) ConsoAnSSII, -- propose annee courante budg.bpmontme Propose, -- propose annee plus 1 budg1.bpmontme ProposePlusUn, -- propose annee plus 2 budg2.bpmontme ProposePlusDeux from ligne_bip lb, struct_info S, proj_info pri, budget budg, ressource r, client_mo cm, budget budg1, budget budg2 where lb.icpi = pri.icpi and S.codsg= lb.codsg and lb.clicode = cm.clicode and lb.pcpi = r.ident and lb.pid = budg.pid (+) and lb.pid = budg1.pid (+) and lb.pid = budg2.pid (+) and lb.typproj!=7 &p_where order by CODEDP, PCMOUVRA, PID, CODCAMO ;

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( substr ( : p_param6 , 5 , 2 ) , '**' , ( S.sigdep || '/' || S.sigpole ) , S.libdsg )

function.name: afterpform
cf_annee0
cf_moisanneeformula
cf_rafformula
cf_consomensformula
cf_g4_rafformula
cf_g2_rafformula
cf_total_rafformula
cf_consoanformula
r_1formattrigger
function.textSource: function R_1FormatTrigger return boolean is begin IF ( (NVL(:NOTIFJH,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:RESERJH,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:ARBITJH,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:REESTJH,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CF_ConsoMens,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CF_ConsoAn,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CF_RAF,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:Propose,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:ProposePlusUn,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:ProposePlusDeux,0)!=0) ) then return (TRUE); else return (FALSE); end if; end;

function.name: cf_consoanneeantformula
function.textSource:
function CF_ConsoAnneeAntFormula return Number is begin IF ( (NVL(:NOTIFJH,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:RESERJH,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:ARBITJH,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:REESTJH,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CF_ConsoMens,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CF_ConsoAn,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CF_RAF,0)!=0) ) then return :ConsoAnneeAnt; else return 0; end if;
end;

function.name: cf_g4_consomensformula
cf_g4_consoanformula
r_4formattrigger
function.textSource: function R_4FormatTrigger return boolean is begin IF ( (NVL(:CS_G4_NOTIFJH,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CS_G4_RESERJH,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CS_G4_ARBITJH,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CS_G4_REESTJH,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CF_G4_ConsoMens,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CF_G4_ConsoAn,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CF_G4_RAF,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CS_G4_Propose,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CS_G4_ProposePlusUn,0)!=0) OR (NVL(:CS_G4_ProposePlusDeux,0)!=0) ) then return (TRUE); else return (FALSE); end if; end;
